item.title: GDS
item.description: The GDS is a collection of three APIs and several background services backed by a global TrtlDB data store. A single GDS node implements the TRISA Directory gRPC API, the secure TRISA Members gRPC API, and the Admin REST API that powers the Admin UI. It also runs the CertMan process that issues and collects certificates from Sectigo. Its environment variables are all prefixed with the GDS_ tag. The primary configuration is as follows:
